Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to the operation of another business on a licensed brewery and farm brewery premises
Summary: Permits the operation of another business on a licensed brewery and farm brewery premises, provided such business complies with the rules and regulations of the state liquor authority.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to operation of another business on a licensed brewery and farm brewery premises
